Driver.Description: Shell to setup and run Cisco TRex traffic
Driver.Name: TRexControllerDriver

Command.Name: upload_server_config
Command.Description: Upload current TRex server configuration file to remote FTP/TFTP Server

Parameter.Name: config_file_url
Parameter.Description: The path in which the current TRex Server configuration file will be saved.

Command.Name: download_server_config
Command.Description: Download configuration file from remote FTP/TFTP Server and set it as TRex Server configuration file

Parameter.Name: config_file_url
Parameter.Description: The path to the TRex Server configuration file, including the configuration file name.

Parameter.Name: config_file_url
Parameter.Description: The path to the test configuration file, including the configuration file name.

Parameter.Name: test_file_name
Parameter.Description: Full name (with extension) of test configuration file

Parameter.Name: blocking
Parameter.Description: Determine if this method blocks until TRex changes state from 'Starting' to either 'Idle' or 'Running'

Parameter.Name: timeout
Parameter.Description: Maximum time (in seconds) to wait in blocking state until TRex changes state from 'Starting' to either 'Idle' or 'Running'

Parameter.Name: force
Parameter.Description: Force killing of running TRex process (if exists) on the server

Command.Name: get_results
Command.Description: Get test result file and attach it to the reservation
